document_data.name: Drakkar Von Damm
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite polyhedron/96/The Ravens Bluff Trumpeter|29}}{{Cite polyhedron/112/The Ravens Bluff Trumpeter|5}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Drakkar Von Damm''' was an adventuring [[paladin]] from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]], active in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Drakkar Von Damm was mentioned in the census of active adventurers of Ravens Bluff in the [[Kythorn]], [[1367 DR]], issue of the ''[[Ravens Bluff Trumpeter]]'' [[broadsheet]].{{LCRB}} Drakkar was named as one of the most experienced and formidable adventurers of the Bluff at the time.

Several [[tenday]]s before the [[Marpenoth]], [[1368 DR]], issue of the ''Trumpeter'' was published, Drakkar Von Damm participated in the grand [[Adventurer Games]] during that year's [[Founders Day Celebration]] hosted by Lady [[Lauren DeVillars]]. Drakkar Von Damm was crowned the Grand Champion and was awarded a precious ornamental [[sword]] from [[Kara-Tur]]. He also was a winner of the [[jousting]] and the [[heavy sword]] dueling competitions.
